data.quote: People are the most important thing. Business model and product will follow if you have the right people.
data.author: Adam Neumann

data.quote: Don’t let others convince you that the idea is good when your gut tells you it’s bad.
data.author: Kevin Rose

data.quote: If we tried to think of a good idea, we wouldn’t have been able to think of a good idea. You just have to find the solution for a problem in your own life.
data.author: Brian Cheski

data.quote: Remain self-funded as long as possible.
data.author: Garrett CampBell

data.quote: If something is important enough, or you believe something is important enough, even if you are scared, you will keep going.
data.author: Elon Musk
